alert.note: Alert for Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 22 at 2:12PM MDT until July 22 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS BELOW 6000 FT INTO EARLY THIS EVENING... .An area of low pressure moving by to our north will continue to generate gusty west to northwest winds into early this evening across much of central and southern Idaho. Winds will combine with low afternoon humidity and dry fuels below 6000 ft to create critical fire weather conditions. Winds will decrease by mid evening with lighter winds on Saturday. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR SOUTHERN BOISE NATIONAL FOREST/WESTERN SAWTOOTH NATIONAL FOREST BELOW 6000 FT...WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 421 BELOW 6000 FT...424 AND 426... * WINDS...Gusts 25 to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...9 to 14 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.

area.areaDesc: Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM
